item.title: Development Manifesto
item.description: At Muze Innovation, our development unit idolized few concepts. Code like Poet – Key Concepts Everyone can write code, but crafting it is another whole story. Even though there are so many concepts in this world of programming. There are something that are so basic, and (to our idea) it is the root of Good coding skills; To groom our team to walk toward the same goal. We have picked some very important key to be illustrated here.
